SwitchPreferenceCompat.android:summary: The Sia node will instead store its data wherever your phone returns as its external storage - this is manufacturer-dependent, and will not necessarily be an external SD card. The Sia node will restart after changing this.
SwitchPreferenceCompat.android:title: Use external storage

EditTextPreference.android:title: API password
EditTextPreference.android:summary: API password to set on the Sia node, so that only this app can interact with it. Optional, but recommended. The Sia node will restart after changing this.

com.vandyke.sia.ui.settings.IntEditTextP.android:summary: The number of decimal places displayed. This does not affect actual precision of values in memory, which is exact. When displayed, they will be rounded up.
com.vandyke.sia.ui.settings.IntEditTextP.android:title: Displayed decimal precision

Preference.android:summary: You can clear all of the Sia node's data from here, such as the blockchain. Doing that will delete ALL of Sia's data, including any wallet files - write down your seed(s) first.
Preference.android:title: Open Application Info page for Sia
